name: StarWarsTopTrumpQuiz
0: ”Alexa, open star wars top trumps quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: star wars top trumps quiz
des:
Are you the ultimate Star Wars fan? Try out this Star Wars quiz that only Star Wars fans would know!

Get ready to challenge yourself and compete on the global monthly leaderboard to see if you are the best of the best on all things Star Wars.

Every day, you will be given a question to answer and score points based on your playing streak for the month.

For example, if you are on a 7-day playing streak, that means you will score 7 points for each question you answer correctly that day.


ALEXA HAVING TROUBLE UNDERSTANDING YOUR ANSWER
Try just saying A, B or C instead
If you're using an Echo Show, try tapping on the answer

Star Wars Top Trumps Quiz is optimized for Echo devices with a screen, such as the Echo Show and Fire TV, but it also works great on all Alexa enabled devices.

For any questions, support or feedback contact: support@adassainnovations.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
